## DashboardInfo interface

Describes the basic dashboard information that can be passed as the meta analytics payload.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export interface DashboardInfo 
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { DashboardInfo } from '@grafana/runtime';
```
